channel.title: Fishing

item.title: Fishing
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

I am trying to make a fully working fishing guild. I tried this below but im not sure how to make it keep fishing without clicking. and how to make it delay between catching fish. Can anyone help me?

[code] if (objectID == 42)
{
pEmote = 622;
addSkillXP(250, 10);
addItem(317, 1);

}[/code]

Read full topic
